item.title: PrestHubot
item.description: PrestHubot Goal Presthubot is the QA team’s Slack Notifier. It checks several rules and sends a report via Slack. Schedule Every week day at 06:45 AM Code You can find the workflow on Github. How it works We can divide the process in two parts : QA Functional & QA Automation. QA Functional PR Stats for QA This returns the number of Pull Requests that are pending: on the various branches under development on modules on specifications But also the PRs awaiting their author, and those that are blocked.
